title: Gluten free fruit muffins
ingredients: ['2 unwaxed lemons, zested and juiced', '250ml milk, at room temperature', '275g to 280g soft fruit, chopped', '50g ground almonds', '175g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '310g sugar (e.g. soft light brown or golden caster)', '4 large eggs', '1 tablespoon lemon, almond or vanilla extract (see tip)', '400g gluten free flour', '3 heaped teaspoons gluten free baking powder']
